DDL.statement: CREATE TABLE `APP_WEIGHT_PRODUCT_GROUP` ( `PRODUCT_GROUP` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `NOMINAL_WEIGHT` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT NULL, `NOMINAL_WEIGHT_UOM` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, `TARE_WEIGHT` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT NULL, `TARE_WEIGHT_UOM` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`PRODUCT_GROUP`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_DETAIL` ( `SAMPLE_POINT` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `SAMPLE_DATE` datetime NOT NULL, `WEIGHT_DATE` datetime NOT NULL, `WEIGHT` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT NULL, `WEIGHT_UOM` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, `SAMPLE_T1_COUNT` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `SAMPLE_T2_COUNT` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`SAMPLE_DATE`,`SAMPLE_POINT`,`WEIGHT_DATE`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `APP_WEIGHT_SAMPLE_HEADER` ( `SAMPLE_POINT` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL, `SAMPLE_DATE` datetime NOT NULL, `USER_ID` varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `WORKSTATION_ID` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT '', `SCALE_ID` varchar(15) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `PROCESS_ORDER` varchar(10) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT '', `REQUIRED_RESOURCE` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `CUSTOMER_ID` varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `MATERIAL` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `PRODUCT_GROUP` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `CONTAINER_CODE` varchar(12) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `TARE_WEIGHT` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT NULL, `TARE_WEIGHT_UOM` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT NULL, `NOMINAL_WEIGHT` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT NULL, `NOMINAL_WEIGHT_UOM` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT NULL, `TNE` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT NULL, `NEG_T1` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `NEG_T2` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `SAMPLE_SIZE` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `SAMPLE_MEAN` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT NULL, `SAMPLE_STD_DEV` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `SAMPLE_T1_COUNT` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `SAMPLE_T2_COUNT` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`SAMPLE_POINT`,`SAMPLE_DATE`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `APP_WEIGHT_SCALE` ( `SCALE_ID` varchar(15) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `MAKE` varchar(15) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `MODEL` varchar(15) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `CONNECTION` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `BAUD_RATE` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `DATA_BITS` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `STOP_BITS` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `FLOW_CONTROL` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `PARITY` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `END_OF_LINE` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`SCALE_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `APP_WEIGHT_TNE` ( `NOMINAL_WEIGHT` decimal(22,3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.000', `NOMINAL_WEIGHT_UOM` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'G', `TNE` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `NEG_T1` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `NEG_T2` decimal(22,3) DEFAULT '0.000', PRIMARY KEY (`NOMINAL_WEIGHT`,`NOMINAL_WEIGHT_UOM`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `APP_WEIGHT_WORKSTATION` ( `WORKSTATION_ID` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(35) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `LOCATION` varchar(35) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `SAMPLE_POINT` varchar(25) DEFAULT NULL, `SCALE_ID` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `SCALE_PORT_ID` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`WORKSTATION_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
